ALPAKA: I hear you. The strap is fully adjustable and isn't designed to stop at a specific fixed point. You can shorten or lengthen it to your preferred fit. If you've already adjusted it to the shortest setting and the buckle is still hitting the padded shoulder strap, please let me know so I can look into this further.
